Configuration.Name: CorpComms
Configuration.Description: This configuration creates or updates the resources for the Corporate Comms Site and creates or updates a Corporate Comms subsite.

Web.Title: Corporate Communications
Web.Description: Welcome to the Corporate Communications Site

List.Title: Events
List.Description: A library created to store corporate communications events.

List.Title: My Favourites
List.Description: A library created to store your favourite links.

List.Title: RB Favourites
List.Description: A library created to store RB Corporate Communications favourite links.

List.Title: Photos
List.Description: A library created to store images that are used on pages in this site.

Property.Name: PublishingPageContent
Property.p: This is a rich HTML page-content field and is used to present Key Information, sed ut perspiciatis unde omnis iste natus error sit voluptatem accusantium doloremque laudantium, totam rem aperiam, eaque ipsa quae ab illo inventore veritatis et quasi architecto beatae vitae dicta sunt explicabo.

a.span: Ordered List Item Key Information Link 1

Property.p: Neque porro quisquam est, qui dolorem ipsum quia dolor sit amet, consectetur, adipisci velit, sed quia non numquam eius modi tempora incidunt ut labore et dolore magnam aliquam quaerat voluptatem?

<webParts>
    <webPart
        xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/WebPart/v3">
        <metaData>
            <type name="Microsoft.SharePoint.WebPartPages.XsltListViewWebPart, Microsoft.SharePoint, Version=15.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=71e9bce111e9429c"/>

                <property name="XmlDefinition" type="string"><View BaseViewID="2" DisplayName="" Hidden="TRUE" Level="1" Name="{FB1BC56D-C0B6-4122-B441-A3F862B1907E}" Type="CALENDAR" TabularView="FALSE" RecurrenceRowset="TRUE"><Query><Where><DateRangesOverlap><FieldRef Name="EventDate" /><FieldRef Name="EndDate" /><FieldRef Name="RecurrenceID" /><Value Type="DateTime" ><Month/></Value></DateRangesOverlap></Where></Query><ViewFields><FieldRef Name="EventDate" /><FieldRef Name="EndDate" /><FieldRef Name="fRecurrence" /><FieldRef Name="EventType" /><FieldRef Name="WorkspaceLink" /><FieldRef Name="Title" /><FieldRef Name="Location" /><FieldRef Name="Description" /><FieldRef Name="Workspace" /><FieldRef Name="MasterSeriesItemID" /><FieldRef Name="fAllDayEvent" /></ViewFields><Toolbar Type="Standard" /></View></property>
                <property name="Title" type="string">Events</property>
                <property name="Description" type="string"></property>
                <property name="ParameterBindings" type="string"><ParameterBinding Name="dvt_sortdir" Location="Postback;Connection"/>
<ParameterBinding Name="dvt_sortfield" Location="Postback;Connection"/>
<ParameterBinding Name="dvt_startposition" Location="Postback" DefaultValue=""/>
<ParameterBinding Name="dvt_firstrow" Location="Postback;Connection"/>
<ParameterBinding Name="OpenMenuKeyAccessible" Location="Resource(wss,OpenMenuKeyAccessible)" />
<ParameterBinding Name="open_menu" Location="Resource(wss,open_menu)" />
<ParameterBinding Name="select_deselect_all" Location="Resource(wss,select_deselect_all)" />
<ParameterBinding Name="idPresEnabled" Location="Resource(wss,idPresEnabled)" /> <ParameterBinding Name="NoAnnouncements" Location="Resource(wss,noXinviewofY_LIST)" />
<ParameterBinding Name="NoAnnouncementsHowTo" Location="Resource(core,noXinviewofY_DEFAULT)" />
<ParameterBinding Name="AddNewAnnouncement" Location="Resource(wss,addnewitem)" />
<ParameterBinding Name="MoreAnnouncements" Location="Resource(wss,moreItemsParen)" /></property>
                <property name="DataSourceMode" type="Microsoft.SharePoint.WebControls.SPDataSourceMode, Microsoft.SharePoint, Version=16.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=71e9bce111e9429c">List</property>
            </properties>
        </data>
    </webPart>
</webParts>

<WebPart xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/WebPart/v2"> <Title>Favourites</Title> <FrameType>None</FrameType> <Description></Description> <IsIncluded>true</IsIncluded> <FrameState>Normal</FrameState> <MissingAssembly>Cannot import this Web Part.</MissingAssembly> <PartImageLarge>/_layouts/15/images/mscontl.gif</PartImageLarge> <IsIncludedFilter /> <Assembly>Microsoft.SharePoint, Version=16.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=71e9bce111e9429c</Assembly> <TypeName>Microsoft.SharePoint.WebPartPages.ContentEditorWebPart</TypeName> <ContentLink xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/WebPart/v2/ContentEditor">~site/SiteAssets/apps/favourites.html</ContentLink> <Content xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/WebPart/v2/ContentEditor" /> <PartStorage xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/WebPart/v2/ContentEditor" /> </WebPart>

<webParts>
   <webPart xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/WebPart/v3">
      <metaData>
         <type name="Microsoft.SharePoint.WebPartPages.ScriptEditorWebPart, Microsoft.SharePoint, Version=16.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=71e9bce111e9429c"/>
         <importErrorMessage>Cannot import this Web Part.</importErrorMessage>
      </metaData>
      <data>
         <properties>
            <property name="Title" type="string">Yammer</property>
            <property name="Description" type="string">Display the All Company Yammer Feed</property>
            <property name="ChromeType" type="chrometype">None</property>
            <property name="Content" type="string"><div id='yammer-embedded-feed-header' style='background-color:#0072C6;width:100%;'>
	<img src='/_catalogs/masterpage/Buzz365/images/yammer-logo-white.png' style='height:24px;padding:10px 15px 8px 15px;' />
</div>
<div id='embedded-feed' style='height:500px;width:100%;'></div>
<script src='https://c64.assets-yammer.com/assets/platform_embed.js' type='text/javascript'></script>
<script>
   yam.connect.embedFeed({
      container: '#embedded-feed',
      network: 'rb.com',
      config: { header: false, footer: false }
   });
</script>
</property>
         </properties>
      </data>
   </webPart>
</webParts>

Comments.Comment: Congratulations, you just provisioned a 'Corporate Communications Site'

Configuration.Name: CorpComms
Configuration.Description: This configuration creates or updates the 'Apps' resources for the Corporate Comms Site.

Web.Title: Corporate Communications
Web.Description: Welcome to the Corporate Communications Site

Comments.Comment: Congratulations, you just provisioned a 'Corporate Communications Site'
